issue.title: [CF 1226] Request to add a condition to check last spell cast
issue.body:
What is the enhancement in mind? How should it look and feel?

Please provide any additional information below.

I was wondering if you have plans to add a condition to check last spell cast by player so that I can use tmw with my windwalker monk in Legion. The new ww mastery gives bonus dps so long as you don't use the same ability twice in a row. I'd love to be able to account for that in tmw.


> Posted by CurseForge user kc5680 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1226 | Raw

comments.body:
Its now in the Player Attributes category


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
